title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 180-1.21 - Abuse, neglect and significant incidents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 180-1.21 - Abuse, neglect and significant incidents

State Regulations

All juvenile detention facilities shall be subject to and
must comply with the requirements as set forth in 18 NYCRR Part
433
and any
other applicable regulations including, but not limited to, 14 NYCRR Parts
703
-
704. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
180-1.21

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

Renumbered from 180.21

New

York State Register July 25, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 30, eff. 7/25/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
